question: If the rate of interest be 4% per annum for first year, 5% per annum for second year and 6% per annum for third year, then the compound interest of 10000 Rs. for 3 years will be :

$latex = 10000\\left ( 1+\\frac{4}{100} \\right )\\left ( 1+\\frac{5}{100} \\right )\\left ( 1+\\frac{6}{100} \\right )&s=1$
$latex = 10000\\times \\frac{26}{25}\\times \\frac{21}{20}\\times \\frac{53}{50}&s=1$
$latex A = 11575.2Rs.$
